actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the hope of the Congress that Pope John Paul II will recover promptly from the wounds suffered by him during an attempted assassination on May 13, 1981.

summary.text: Expresses the hope of the Congress that Pope John Paul II will recover promptly from the attempt to assassinate him.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the hope of the Congress that Pope John Paul II will recover promptly from the wounds suffered by him during an attempted assassination on May 13, 1981.
